intro.step2_info: Did you know that 90% of Europeans living in cities are exposed to levels of air pollution deemed damaging to human health? Knowing more about air quality is the first step to improving it.

air_quality.register_for_personalized_info: Register to get personalised info about the air quality in your neighbourhood!
air_quality.register_to_measure_and_contribute: Register to measure and contribute the air quality in your neighbourhood!

photos.the_photo_does_not_contain_usable_sky: The photo does not contain usable sky.
photos.NOT_AVAILABLE: not available for photos with non-usable sky

photo.take_a_cots_sensor_photo: Take a photo of your hackAIR cardboard sensor
photo.how_to_1: A part of the photo should contain the sky.
photo.how_to_2: The sun should not be visible in the photo.
photo.how_to_3: The photo should not be taken near sunrise or sunset.
photo.how_to_4: The camera should not be tilted very much.
photo.how_to_5: Take the photo and click submit.
photo.cots_how_to_1: Retrieve the hackAIR cardboard sensor, without damaging the petroleum jelly layer.
photo.cots_how_to_2: Place it on a flat surface, for instance a table or a desk.
photo.cots_how_to_3: Use a macro lens and adjust it to the cell phone's camera.
photo.cots_how_to_4: Place the cell phone, with the adjusted camera, above the two dots.
photo.cots_how_to_5: Focus the camera sensor at the dots or wait until it auto-focused.
photo.cots_how_to_6: Take a photo and upload it to the hackAIR app.

profile.outdoor_activities: I want information about these outdoor activities

delete_account.disclaimer: Your account will be deactivated. If we don't hear from you, we will delete all associated data within 30 days. Contact us if you want to reactivate your account.

follows.list_of_users_followers: This is a list of users that are following you.
follows.list_of_users_following: This is a list of users that you are following.

air_quality.perception_heading: How do you feel the air today?

disclaimers.disclaimer_measurements: This index is only a qualitative representation of the ambient air quality, and is still in experimental stage. Reports, studies and other scientific interpretations should only be performed by using established measurement methodologies.
disclaimers.disclaimer_recommendations: These recommendations do not constitute a medical or emergency advice. Please only use them for informational purposes.
disclaimers.disclaimer_quality_history: The current index was calculated from all the available data sources for the city centre.
disclaimers.disclaimer_unsupportedcity: Currently we do not estimate the air quality index for this city. You can though check the map for other users' contributions and upload your own measurements!

sensors.time_disclaimer: One measurement per minute - wait to see the next one.

missions.new_mission_prompt: We have prepared a new mission for you. Check it out!
